codes.ARDT: Already returned original SCT (SEPA Credit Transfer).
codes.ARJT: Already rejected original SCT (SEPA Credit Transfer).
codes.RNPR: Original credit transfer was received but is not processable.

description: Specifies the reason for the rejection of a claim non receipt, as published in an external claim non receipt rejection code set.
name: ExternalClaimNonReceiptRejection1Code
